infringement_analysis: Patent claims' essential elements and purposive construction
relevant_statute: Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations, SOR/93-133
application_of_law: Novopharm uses HPC instead of HPMC in their bupropion hydrochloride tablets
expert_testimony: Experts agree HPC and HPMC are similar but differ on whether HPMC is essential
decision_conclusion: Novopharm does not infringe either patent
